data.text: Gumazir kam ua kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Nɨ Sardisɨn nguibar ekiamɨn itir siosɨn garir ensel bagh akataba osirigh. Akar kaba kamakɨn:

Kɨ ia amir arazibar gara ghaze, da nan Godɨn damazimɨn tɨghar deragham. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, ia osegh daguraguim atakigh. Ian araziba, bar ovengezir puvatɨ, dar muziariba mong ikiavɨra iti, ia ua gavgavim dar anɨng.

3:3 Matyu 24:43-44; Luk 12:39-40; 1 Tesalonika 5:2; 5:6; 1 Timoti 6:20; 2 Pita 3:10; Akar Mogomem 2:5; 16:15Akar aghuir ia fomɨram oregha inizir kam, ia uam a gɨnɨghnɨgh. Egh ia navibagh iragh, bar deravɨram an gɨn mangɨ. Ia osegh daguraguim ateghan koghtɨ, kɨ okɨmakɨar gumazim izi moghɨn, ia batogham. Eghtɨ ia dughiar kɨ ia bagh izamim gɨfoghan kogham.

“Ezɨ ian gumazamizir maba Sardisɨn ikiavɨra iti, me uan korotiabagh amizɨ da mɨzezir puvatɨ. Gumazamizir kabar araziba derazɨ, kɨ me uabɨn toro, ezɨ kamaghɨn amizɨ me korotiar ghurghuribar aghuigh na ko daruam.

3:5 Ua Me Ini 32:32-33; Onger Akaba 69:28; Matyu 10:32; Luk 10:20; 12:8; Filipai 4:3; Akar Mogomem 3:18; 19:8; 20:12Gumazamizir mɨdorozim gamua apaniba abɨriba, korotiar ghurghurir kamagh garitam arughtɨ, akɨnafarir God gumazamizir ikɨrɨmɨrir zurara itim iniamin ziaba osirizim, kɨ men ziaba angarighan kogham. Puvatɨ. Kɨ uan afeziam ko an enselbar damazibar gumazir kamɨn gun mɨkɨm suam, me konanaba.
Tina kuarimning iti, an akar Godɨn Duam siosbav geiba baragh.”
Gumazir kam ua kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Nɨ Filadelfian nguibar ekiamɨn itir siosɨn garir ensel bagh akataba osirigh. Akar kaba kamakɨn:

3:8 1 Korin 16:9; 2 Korin 2:12; Akar Mogomem 2:2Kɨ ia amir araziba bar dagh fogha gɨfa, ezɨ ia orakigh. Kɨ ian damazimɨn tiam kuizɨma a iti. Eghtɨ gumazitam uam anesaraghan kogham. Kɨ kamaghɨn fo, ian gavgavir muziarim ikiavɨra iti, ezɨ ia nan akamɨn gɨn ghua, egha akɨrim ragha nan ziam gasarazir puvatɨ.

3:9 Aisaia 43:4; 45:14; 49:23; 60:14; Akar Mogomem 2:9Ia Satanɨn adarazigh fo, me kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze, me Judan adarasi. Egha me Judan adarazi puvatɨ, me ifavarir gumazamiziba. Ia orakigh. Kɨ gumazamizir kabar amightɨ me izɨ ian suebar apengan teviba apɨrigh, egh me kamaghɨn fogham, kɨ bar ia gifonge.

3:10 Aisaia 24:17; Luk 21:19; 2 Timoti 2:12; 2 Pita 2:9Ia nan akamra gɨn ghuava osɨmtɨzir ia bativiba ia dar aven tugha gavgavighavɨra iti. Kamagh amizɨ, kɨ ian ganam. God gɨn nguazimɨn itir gumazamiziba bar, men nɨghnɨzir gavgavim tuisɨgh egh foghasa, a gavgaviz, o puvatɨ, eghtɨ kamaghɨn osɨmtɨzir ekiamɨn dughiam otoghtɨ, dughiar kamɨn kɨ ian gantɨ ia deragham.
“Kɨ bar kɨran oveghangɨn ia batogham. Gumazitam ian ivezir aghuim okemeghan koghsɨ, kamaghɨn bizir ia suirazim, ia bar an suiragh gavgafigh.

3:12 Aisaia 62:2; 65:15; Esekiel 48:35; Galesia 4:26; Hibru 12:22; Akar Mogomem 14:1; 21:2Gumazamizir mɨdorozim gamua apaniba abɨriba, kɨ gumazamizir kaba damightɨ me nan Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn dɨpenir akɨnibar mɨn tughɨv ikiam. Egh me Godɨn Dɨpenim ategh uam azenan mangan kogham. Bar puvatɨ. Kɨ gumazamizir kabar, uan Godɨn ziam men osirigh, egh kɨ uan Godɨn Nguibamɨn ziam osirigham. Jerusalemɨn igiar kam, a nan God ko ikegh otogh overiam ategh izighiram. Kɨ uabɨ uan ziar igiam, kɨ gumazamizir kabar uaghan men osirigham.
Tina kuarimning iti, an akar Godɨn Duam siosbav geiba baragh.”
Gumazir kam ua kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Nɨ Laodisian nguibar ekiamɨn itir siosɨn garir ensel bagh akataba osirigh. Akar kaba kamakɨn:
3:15 Rom 12:11; Akar Mogomem 2:2Kɨ ia amir araziba bar dagh fo. Kɨ fo, ia orangizir puvatɨ, egha feir puvatɨ. Kɨ kamaghɨn ifonge, ia orangigh ikɨ, o ia feng ikɨ.
Ezɨ puvatɨ. Ia mong, ganadamra fei. Ia bar puvɨra feir puvatɨ, egha bar orangizir puvatɨ. Kamagh amizɨ, kɨ uan akamɨn ian mighasava ami.

“Ia kamaghɨn mɨgɨa ghaze, ‘E bizir avɨriba ko dagɨar avɨriba iti. E bizitamɨn otevir puvatɨ.’ Ezɨ puvatɨ. Ian dabirabim pazavɨra itima, gumazamiziba ian garava bar ian apangkufi. Ia bar biziba puvatɨgha damaziba okavigha bibiabara iti. Egha ia uari bizir kam gɨfozir puvatɨ.3:17 Laodisiaba uari uan damazibar gara ghaze, me bizir avɨriba iti. Egha Godɨn damazimɨn me bar onganarazibar mɨn iti. Nɨ Akar Mogomem 2:9ɨn gan.

“Kamagh amizɨ, kɨ nɨghnɨzir kam ia danɨngasa. Nan gol avim bar an isigha an itir bizir kuraba bar da adangi. Kamaghɨn ia golɨn kam na dama a givezegh, dagɨaba avɨrasemegham. Egh uaghan ia uan mɨkarzim avɨsɨ korotiar ghurghuritam givesegh, eghtɨ gumazamiziba ian gantɨ ia bibiabara ikɨva, aghumsɨghan kogham. Egh uaghan ia uan damazibar aghusɨ marasin givesegh, egh ia ganam.
“Gumazamizir kɨ ifongeziba, kɨ men atar men arazibar kɨram. Kamagh amizɨ, ia uan araziba akɨrsɨ gavgavigh uan navibagh iragh.
“Ia oragh, kɨ tiar akamɨn tughav ikia, a gafughafusi. Ia nan tiarim baregh egh tiam kuightɨ, kɨ aven mangɨ ia ko ikiam. Egh kɨ ia ko damam, eghtɨ ia na ko damam.

“Gumazamizir mɨdorozim gamua apaniba abɨriba, kɨ men amamangatɨghtɨ me na ko nan atrivir dabirabim dapiam, mati kɨ fomɨra uaghan mɨdorozim gamigha uan apanim abɨragha, uan afeziam ko an atrivir dabirabim gapera.
Tina kuarimning iti, an akar Godɨn Duam siosbav geiba baragh.”
